ev3.beepNote.description: play some note on EV3 for some time

ev3.buttonPressed.description: is a button on some port pressed?

ev3.getMotorPosition.description: get the measured degrees a motor has turned

ev3.motorSetPower.description: set a motor's power to some value

ev3.motorTurnClockwise.message: modur [PORT] yn troi ffordd hyn am [TIME] eiliad
ev3.motorTurnClockwise.description: turn a motor clockwise for some time

ev3.motorTurnCounterClockwise.message: modur [PORT] yn troi ffordd yna am [TIME] eiliad
ev3.motorTurnCounterClockwise.description: turn a motor counter-clockwise for some time

ev3.whenBrightnessLessThan.description: when value measured by brightness sensor is less than some value

ev3.whenButtonPressed.message: pan mae'r botwm [PORT]yn cael ei bwyso
ev3.whenButtonPressed.description: when a button connected to a port is pressed

ev3.whenDistanceLessThan.description: when the value measured by the distance sensor is less than some value

microbit.buttonsMenu.any.description: label for "any" element in button picker for micro:bit extension

microbit.clearDisplay.description: display nothing on the micro:bit display

microbit.defaultTextToDisplay.description:
default text to display.
                                IMPORTANT - the micro:bit only supports letters a-z, A-Z.
                                Please substitute a default word in your language
                                that can be written with those characters,
                                substitute non-accented characters or leave it as "Hello!".
                                Check the micro:bit site documentation for details

microbit.displaySymbol.description: display a pattern on the micro:bit display

microbit.displayText.description: display text on the micro:bit display

microbit.gesturesMenu.jumped.description: label for jumped gesture in gesture picker for micro:bit extension

microbit.gesturesMenu.moved.description: label for moved gesture in gesture picker for micro:bit extension

microbit.gesturesMenu.shaken.description: label for shaken gesture in gesture picker for micro:bit extension

microbit.isButtonPressed.description: is the selected button on the micro:bit pressed?

microbit.isTilted.description: is the micro:bit is tilted in a direction?

microbit.pinStateMenu.off.description: label for off element in pin state picker for micro:bit extension

microbit.pinStateMenu.on.description: label for on element in pin state picker for micro:bit extension

microbit.tiltAngle.description: how much the micro:bit is tilted in a direction

microbit.tiltDirectionMenu.any.description: label for any direction element in tilt direction picker for micro:bit extension

microbit.tiltDirectionMenu.back.description: label for back element in tilt direction picker for micro:bit extension

microbit.tiltDirectionMenu.front.description: label for front element in tilt direction picker for micro:bit extension

microbit.tiltDirectionMenu.left.description: label for left element in tilt direction picker for micro:bit extension

microbit.tiltDirectionMenu.right.description: label for right element in tilt direction picker for micro:bit extension

microbit.whenButtonPressed.message: pan mae botwm [BTN] yn cael ei bwyso
microbit.whenButtonPressed.description: when the selected button on the micro:bit is pressed

microbit.whenGesture.description: when the selected gesture is detected by the micro:bit

microbit.whenPinConnected.description: when the pin detects a connection to Earth/Ground

microbit.whenTilted.description: when the micro:bit is tilted in a direction

music.categoryName.description: Label for the Music extension category

music.changeTempo.description: change tempo (speed) for notes, drums, and rests played

music.drumBass.description: Sound of bass drum as used in a standard drum kit

music.drumBongo.description: Sound of a bongo being struck

music.drumCabasa.description: Sound of a cabasa being shaken

music.drumClaves.description: Sound of claves being struck together

music.drumClosedHiHat.description: Sound of a drum stick hitting a hi-hat while closed

music.drumConga.description: Sound of a conga being struck

music.drumCowbell.description: Sound of a cowbell being struck

music.drumCrashCymbal.description: Sound of a drum stick hitting a crash cymbal

music.drumCuica.description: Sound of a cuica being played

music.drumGuiro.description: Sound of a guiro being played

music.drumHandClap.description: Sound of two hands clapping together

music.drumOpenHiHat.description: Sound of a drum stick hitting a hi-hat while open

music.drumSideStick.description: Sound of a drum stick hitting the side of a drum (usually the snare)

music.drumSnare.description: Sound of snare drum as used in a standard drum kit

music.drumTambourine.description: Sound of a tambourine being struck

music.drumTriangle.description: Sound of a triangle (instrument) being struck

music.drumVibraslap.description: Sound of a Vibraslap being played

music.drumWoodBlock.description: Sound of a wood block being struck

music.getTempo.description: get the current tempo (speed) for notes, drums, and rests played

music.instrumentBass.description: Sound of an accoustic upright bass

music.instrumentBassoon.description: Sound of a bassoon being played

music.instrumentCello.description: Sound of a cello being played with a bow

music.instrumentClarinet.description: Sound of a clarinet being played

music.instrumentFlute.description: Sound of a flute being played

music.instrumentMarimba.description: Sound of a marimba being struck

music.instrumentMusicBox.description: Sound of a music box playing

music.instrumentPizzicato.description: Sound of a string instrument (e.g. violin) being plucked

music.instrumentSaxophone.description: Sound of a saxophone being played

music.instrumentSteelDrum.description: Sound of a steel drum being struck

music.instrumentSynthLead.description: Sound of a "lead" synthesizer being played

music.instrumentSynthPad.description: Sound of a "pad" synthesizer being played

music.instrumentTrombone.description: Sound of a trombone being played

music.instrumentVibraphone.description: Sound of a vibraphone being struck

music.instrumentWoodenFlute.description: Sound of a wooden flute being played

music.midiSetInstrument.description: set the instrument for notes played according to a mapping of MIDI codes

music.playDrumForBeats.description: play drum sample for a number of beats

music.playNoteForBeats.description: play a note for a number of beats

music.restForBeats.description: rest (play no sound) for a number of beats

music.setInstrument.description: set the instrument (e.g. piano, guitar, trombone) for notes played

music.setTempo.description: set tempo (speed) for notes, drums, and rests played

pen.categoryName.description: Label for the pen extension category

pen.changeColorParam.description: change the state of a pen color parameter

pen.changeHue.description: legacy pen blocks - change pen color

pen.changeShade.description: legacy pen blocks - change pen shade

pen.changeSize.description: change the diameter of the trail left by a sprite

pen.clear.description: erase all pen trails and stamps

pen.colorMenu.brightness.description: label for brightness element in color picker for pen extension

pen.colorMenu.color.description: label for color element in color picker for pen extension

pen.colorMenu.saturation.description: label for saturation element in color picker for pen extension

pen.colorMenu.transparency.description: label for transparency element in color picker for pen extension

pen.penDown.description: start leaving a trail when the sprite moves

pen.penUp.description: stop leaving a trail behind the sprite

pen.setColor.description: set the pen color to a particular (RGB) value

pen.setColorParam.description: set the state for a pen color parameter e.g. saturation

pen.setHue.description: legacy pen blocks - set pen color to number

pen.setShade.description: legacy pen blocks - set pen shade

pen.setSize.description: set the diameter of a trail left by a sprite

pen.stamp.description: render current costume on the background

speech.defaultWhenIHearValue.description: The default phrase/word that, when heard, triggers the event.

speech.extensionName.description: Name of extension that adds speech recognition blocks. Do Not translate Google.

speech.listenAndWait.description: Start listening to the microphone and wait for a result from the speech recognition system.

speech.speechReporter.description: Get the text of spoken words transcribed by the speech recognition system.

speech.whenIHear.description: Event that triggers when the text entered on the block is recognized by the speech recognition system.

text2speech.defaultTextToSpeak.description: hello: the default text to speak

text2speech.giant.description: Name for a funny voice with a low pitch.

text2speech.max.description: Name for a voice with ambiguous gender.

text2speech.quinn.description: Name for a voice with ambiguous gender.

text2speech.setLanguageBlock.description: Set the language for speech synthesis.

text2speech.setVoiceBlock.description: Set the voice for speech synthesis.

text2speech.squeak.description: Name for a funny voice with a high pitch.

translate.categoryName.description: Name of extension that adds translate blocks

translate.defaultTextToTranslate.description: hello: the default text to translate

translate.translateBlock.description: translate some text to a different language

translate.viewerLanguage.description: the languge of the project viewer

videoSensing.categoryName.description: Label for the video sensing extension category

videoSensing.onFlipped.description: Option for the "turn video [STATE]" block that causes the video to be flipped horizontally (reversed as in a mirror)

videoSensing.setVideoTransparency.description: Controls transparency of the video preview layer

videoSensing.videoOn.description: Reporter that returns the amount of [ATTRIBUTE] for the selected [SUBJECT]

videoSensing.videoToggle.description: Controls display of the video preview layer

videoSensing.whenMotionGreaterThan.description: Event that triggers when the amount of motion is greater than [REFERENCE]

wedo2.getDistance.description: the value returned by the distance sensor

wedo2.getTiltAngle.description: the angle returned by the tilt sensor

wedo2.isTilted.description: whether the tilt sensor is tilted

wedo2.motorDirection.backward.description: label for backward element in motor direction menu for LEGO WeDo 2 extension

wedo2.motorDirection.forward.description: label for forward element in motor direction menu for LEGO WeDo 2 extension

wedo2.motorDirection.reverse.description: label for reverse element in motor direction menu for LEGO WeDo 2 extension

wedo2.motorId.a.description: label for motor A element in motor menu for LEGO WeDo 2 extension

wedo2.motorId.all.description: label for all motors element in motor menu for LEGO WeDo 2 extension

wedo2.motorId.b.description: label for motor B element in motor menu for LEGO WeDo 2 extension

wedo2.motorId.default.description: label for motor element in motor menu for LEGO WeDo 2 extension

wedo2.motorOnFor.description: turn a motor on for some time

wedo2.playNoteFor.description: play a certain note for some time

wedo2.startMotorPower.description: set the motor's power and turn it on

wedo2.tiltDirection.any.description: label for any element in tilt direction menu for LEGO WeDo 2 extension

wedo2.tiltDirection.down.description: label for down element in tilt direction menu for LEGO WeDo 2 extension

wedo2.tiltDirection.left.description: label for left element in tilt direction menu for LEGO WeDo 2 extension

wedo2.tiltDirection.right.description: label for right element in tilt direction menu for LEGO WeDo 2 extension

wedo2.tiltDirection.up.description: label for up element in tilt direction menu for LEGO WeDo 2 extension

wedo2.whenDistance.description: check for when distance is < or > than reference

wedo2.whenTilted.description: check when tilted in a certain direction
